news_sources.title: News Sources
news_sources.description: Select news sources to monitor. Choose from major outlets or add custom RSS feeds.

custom_rss_feeds.title: Custom RSS Feeds
custom_rss_feeds.description: Add custom RSS feed URLs (used when 'custom' is selected above)

keywords.title: Keywords & Brand Monitoring
keywords.description: Keywords, brand names, or topics to monitor in news articles. Leave empty to analyze all articles.

enable_ai_analysis.title: Enable AI Analysis
enable_ai_analysis.description: Enable sentiment analysis, summarization, and categorization (uses built-in AI - costs $6 per 1,000 articles)

openai_api_key.title: OpenAI API Key (BYOK)
openai_api_key.description: Provide your own OpenAI API key for unlimited usage (pricing: $2 per 1,000 articles). Leave empty to use built-in AI.

sentiment_analysis.title: Sentiment Analysis
sentiment_analysis.description: Analyze emotional tone of articles (positive, negative, neutral)

summarization.title: Article Summarization
summarization.description: Generate AI-powered summaries of long articles

topic_classification.title: Topic Classification
topic_classification.description: Automatically categorize articles by topic (Politics, Business, Tech, etc.)

entity_extraction.title: Entity Recognition
entity_extraction.description: Extract people, companies, locations, and events mentioned in articles

real_time_monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
real_time_monitoring.description: Enable continuous monitoring for breaking news and alerts

max_articles.title: Maximum Articles
max_articles.description: Maximum number of articles to analyze

industry_focus.title: Industry Focus
industry_focus.description: Focus on specific industries for enhanced analysis

alert_webhooks.title: Alert Webhooks
alert_webhooks.description: Webhook URLs to receive real-time alerts for breaking news or keyword mentions

include_social_metrics.title: Include Social Metrics
include_social_metrics.description: Include social media engagement data when available
